name: Nundro Rockseeker

personality.condition: Bound, badly disheveled, grateful if rescued

background: One of three Rockseeker brothers. Captured by Nezznar when exploring Wave Echo Cave with Tharden.
status: Tharden killed (body at cave entrance area 1). Nundro interrogated harshly by Nezznar every 1-2 days.
knowledge: Doesn't know more about cave layout than party will discover. But knows family history of Phandelver's Pact.
if_rescued: Wants to stay with party through Wave Echo Cave. Can use loaned weapon (no armor). See NPC Party Members rules.
reward: 200 XP if rescued alive and survives adventure
development: After adventure, helps Gundren administer mine. Grateful to party forever.
